channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: The U.S. is still hopeful abou
item.description: The U.S. is still hopeful about brokering a normalisation agreement between #Israel & #SaudiArabia. A top U.S. official said Washington is working on the initiative despite rising mid-east tensions
